title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2376/96 of 13 December 1996 derogating, for an additional period of one year, from Regulation (EEC) No 920/89, as regards carrots covered with pure peat produced in Sweden and Finland
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2376/96 of 13 December 1996 derogating, for an additional period of one year, from Regulation (EEC) No 920/89, as regards carrots covered with pure peat produced in Sweden and Finland
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Carrots produced in Sweden and in Finland and covered with pure peat may be marketed in Sweden and Finland and exported to third countries.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1997.
It shall apply until 31 December 1997.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 December 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 118, 20. 5. 1972, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 132, 16. 6. 1995, p. 8.
(3) OJ No L 97, 11. 4. 1989, p. 19.
(4) OJ No L 135, 6. 6. 1996, p. 21.
(5) OJ No L 323, 16. 12. 1994, p. 23.
(6) OJ No L 39, 17. 2. 1996, p. 18.
(7) OJ No L 323, 16. 12. 1994, p. 22.
